Description:
Detects potential suspicious run-only executions compiled using OSACompile

Author: Sohan G (D4rkCiph3r)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: OSACompile Run-Only Execution
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%osacompile%' and command like '% -x %' and command like '% -e %')
